sentence: He entered the state's Democratic Senate primary in July against a crowded field, including state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski and businessman Alex Lasry.

title: Democrats look to diversify ranks in bid to keep Senate

sentence: An internal poll released by the Barnes campaign on Friday found that the lieutenant governor has a 29-point lead over Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry and a 30-point lead over Wisconsin Treasurer Sarah Godlewski.

title: Booker endorses Mandela Barnes in Wisconsin Senate race

title: Barnes rakes in almost $150K after Johnson enters Wisconsin Senate race

sentence: Nineteen percent backed Barnes, while Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry received 16 percent and state treasurer Sarah Godlewski won 7 percent.
